org.spongepowered.api.math

Interface Vector2i

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Vector2i>, java.io.Serializable

    public interface Vector2i
extends java.lang.Comparable<Vector2i>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Represent a 2 component vector using ints. It is immutable and all vectors returned by the methods are new instances. Double overloads are floored to ints before the operation, and int vectors are returned.

    • Method Summary
